name: Of bots and mirrors
description:
Submission for the gamedev.js gamejam, adhering to the theme 'mirror'.

puzzle your way through a dimensional collapse between the regular, and mirror universe, using the fact that the bots are only affected by everything in their own dimension.

Controls:

W,A,S,D/ arrow keysMove
Rreset level
Left Shift
Speed up the bots
Space/Enter
Revealed in level 10
QRevealed in level 14

This is game marks many firsts for me; it's the first game in unity, first experience with coding and first time making the visual assets myself. Although I'm not sure how good the final product is, I've had a lot of fun making this.
